chart_description: This chart displays the total CPU utilization.

dimension_descriptions.iowait: The percentage of time the CPU is idle during which the system is waiting for an I/O operation to complete.
dimension_descriptions.nice: The percentage of CPU time consumed by user processes that have been explicitly reniced.
dimension_descriptions.softirq: The percentage of CPU time taken up by soft interrupts.
dimension_descriptions.steal: The percentage of CPU time a virtual CPU has to wait for a real CPU while the hypervisor is servicing another virtual processor.
dimension_descriptions.system: The percentage of CPU time consumed by system processes.
dimension_descriptions.user: The percentage of CPU time consumed by user processes.
